Bio

Hi! You can call me Cha. ‚úåÔ∏è I'm an art school dropout and self-taught programmer.

Currently, I work as a founding engineer at Highnote.fm. I've previously worked at places like Shortcut, Squarespace, and Wix, and am a proud alum of the Recurse Center.

I've been lucky to work on some fun projects with some smart people. I live in New York and spend most of my time writing code and playing table tennis.

I'm easy to find. Drop me an email or come join one of my Twitch streams! Links below.
